FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 582 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 Unnamed 2007 c **CATBOAT**, by Tale of the Cat. 6 wins at 3, $221,659, 1st Arlington Breeders' Cup Oaks **[G3]** (AP, $60,000), 2nd Sweetest Chant S. (AP, $10,800), 3rd Golden Sylvia H. [L] (MNR, $7,500), Pippin S. (OP, $5,000), Mariah's Storm S. (AP, $5,181), Merry Colleen S. (HAW, $4,620). Sent from United States to Ireland in 2009. Returned to United States from Great Britain in 2009. Died 2018. Half-sister to **This Fleet Is Due** ($351,090, 2nd Long Branch Breeders' Cup S. [L] (MTH, $20,000), sire), **Betty Garr** ($68,240, 2nd Bara Lass S.-R (HOU, $10,000), etc.).
